title: Is having an existential crisis a permanent state? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is having an existential crisis a permanent state? ex•is•ten•tial ĕg″zĭ-stĕn′shəl, ĕk″sĭ- adj. Of, relating to, or dealing with existence.adj. Based on experience; empirical.adj. Of or as conceived by existentialism or existentialists. More at Wordnik crisis Definitions from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition. noun A crucial or decisive point or situation, especially a difficult or unstable situation involving an impending change.noun A sudden change in the course of a disease or fever, toward either improvement or deterioration.noun An emotionally stressful event or traumatic change in a person's life.noun A point in a story or drama when a conflict reaches its highest tension and must be resolved. When you look up the actual definition you wonder WTF the expression is talking about.

Nothing is permanent unless you allait to be. In life we live in states the state you always go to is the state you have basically made your home.A negative person can become positive Nd vice versa but everything comes ultimately to the state you decide to go to. Since you attract what you think of them control your mental state to be that of your desires.
